# The `CFGState` Struct Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Hold state information used when constructing the CFG of the output IR, traversing the VPBasicBlocks and generating corresponding IR BasicBlocks. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

Hold state information used when constructing the CFG of the output IR, traversing the VPBasicBlocks and generating corresponding IR BasicBlocks.

Definition at line 333 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplan-h">VPlan.h</a>.

### VPBB2IRBB {#a0741c1fb9535c8e4dcd98d3f1f41474d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>SmallDenseMap&lt;VPBasicBlock &#42;, BasicBlock &#42;&gt; llvm::VPTransformState::CFGState::VPBB2IRBB</>}>
A mapping of each <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpbasicblock">VPBasicBlock</a> to the corresponding <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a>.

In case of replication, maps the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> of the last replica created.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplan-h/#l00347">347</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplan-h">VPlan.h</a>.
